about_lead: RPA is a project that runs tabletop role-playing games online. Since 2020 we launched 13+ systems and our game-masters ran over 1500 sessions.
about_body: RPA brings players and GMs together, provides a platform for recordings, modules and community resources.
about_DM1: A storyteller with vast experience in gothic and horror sessions. Enjoys deep plots and complex moral choices.
about_DM2: Specialist in techno settings and atmospheric cyberpunk campaigns.
about_DM3: Excels at historical and horror setups. Values detailed interaction between the world and the characters.
about_DM4: A young and energetic storyteller who enjoys dynamic and combat-focused mechanics.
game_desc_witcher: A campaign set in a grim world where players’ choices shape the story.
